game.name: Drag Racing Club
game.description:
It is always exciting to wait for the green signal and get you ready to face off the biggest rivals on the race track! Start your engine, have a look at your opponent and when the light turning green, you leave the place like a rocket! Join Drag Racing Club and be prepared to experience the amazing thrills of an unmatched drag race competition! Put your fingers on keyboard or your mobile phone and gear up to drive a car like a pro!
In this brand new car game, your perfect timing will help you to hit the checkered flag first. The best part is that your every successful effort will reward you with some cash. Use that money to upgrade your vehicle, shifters, nitrous and overall power! The collection of good upgrades will allow you to challenge more opponents shortly. Try to put your intense driving abilities to the test to make your vehicle to the next tier! Race your vehicle in the underground streets perfectly to be a street racing champion in this html5 racing game!
Your opponents are very sharp and will try every possible effort to leave you behind. But, you would have a chance to earn cash and upgrade your vehicles to the max. Keep winning each race to unlock all of the powerful upgrades and finish all of the fun levels in this cool drag racing game! Tap the controls with mouse, use N for nitro and enter to shift when you explore it in your desktop! Check out more funny and engaging kids racing games and have fun with your friends no download required!
